revised_title: New Species of Rhinoceros and Fossil Skull Comparison
tldr: The author discusses the discovery of a new species of rhinoceros found in Africa, whose skull closely resembles that of a fossilized rhinoceros skull found in Siberia. The author also explores the possibility of other extinct animals still being in existence and the migration patterns of animals in Africa. The comparison of the skulls challenges the belief that all fossils differ from living animals.
